meanings.definition: Happening by chance at the same time.
meanings.sent1: The coincidently timed arrival of the bus and the train saved me from waiting long.
meanings.sent2: The meeting ended coincidently with the start of the rain shower.
meanings.sent3: It was coincidently lucky that I found my lost keys just before leaving for the trip.
meanings.sent4: The stars aligned coincidently, creating a breathtaking night sky.
meanings.sent5: The rainbow appeared coincidently after the rain, painting the sky with vibrant colors.
